main event: A flying disc was reported circling over Riverdale, Chicago on 7 August 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as traveling very high and very fast., A witness reported hearing what sounded like an airplane before seeing the object., The flying disc was observed by 32 witnesses., The object was described as too round to be an airplane and too fast to be a balloon., No further investigation was deemed necessary by headquarters.
witness description: witnesses near Riverdale who reported the sighting
